SELECT dis.disc_num, dis.del_num, dis.disc_buyDate, dis.disc_code, dis.member_id, dis.disc_buyStep, dis.sale_div, s.sale_rate, del.del_name, del.del_addr, del.del_hp, cat.category, cat.mDev, cat.sDev, per.disc_title, per.disc_image, per.disc_con, per.cateNum, per.first_grade, per.disc_step, per.disc_count FROM DiscBuy dis JOIN sale s ON dis.sale_div = s.sale_div JOIN delevaryInfo del ON dis.del_num = del.del_num JOIN perDisc per ON dis.disc_code = per.disc_code JOIN category cat ON per.cateNum = cat.cateNum
member_id LIKE '${member_id}' AND disc_buyStep LIKE '${disc_buyStep}'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM performanceInfo per JOIN category cat ON per.cateNum = cat.cateNum JOIN hallInfo hal ON per.hall_id = hal.hall_id JOIN place pla ON hal.place_num = pla.place_num WHERE NOT(per.per_step LIKE 4) AND sDev LIKE '${sDev}'
AND ( pla.province LIKE '${place}' OR pla.city LIKE '${place}' )
ORDER BY
endDate
